sentence.Network_en: Insurance contract is the carrier that connects the interests of each policyholder.
sentence.Network_cn: 保险合同是将各投保人利益连接在一起的载体.

sentence.Network_en: The policyholder and the insured could be different persons.
sentence.Network_cn: 投保人和被保险人可以是不同人.

sentence.Network_en: In fact, this approach is wrong, policyholder will be money wasted.
sentence.Network_cn: 其实, 这种做法也是错误的, 投保人会白白浪费钱财.

entry.def: A policyholder is a person who has an insurance policy with an insurance company.

example.ex: The first 10 per cent of legal fees will be paid by the policy-holder.
example.tran: 第一笔10%的法律费用将由投保人支付。

means.word_mean: 1. an insured person; the client in whose name an insurance policy is written
